scrum.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a part of a game of rugby when the players all push together in a circle, with their heads down, and try to get the ball
scrum.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a crowd of people who are all close together and pushing each other to try to get something
scrum.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He struggled through the scrum of people to the kitchen.
